name: KITH&KATH (Δ)
description:
! WARNING !

POTENTIALLY TRIGGER SEIZURES FOR PEOPLE WITH PHOTOSENSITIVE EPILEPSY.

CONTROLLER:
P1//
WAD + SPACE
P2//
KEYS + SPACE

Unique gaming experience. 2 players must co-op using the same controller to deliver a pass.
Kith and Kath are friendly cats, they would really like to play with the wool. Help them return the wool ball to the desired location.
Be aware, once your cat catches a ball, he will never back or return. Use the space key to pass it to your best buddy.

Prototype created for educational purposes only, feel free to watch the trailer.

I challenge you to experience it, contact me, or even buy a coffee ;)
